cleaned_text: I have the pleasure of serving many children that have neurological challenges such as autism, ADD/ADHD, SPD, etc. When I ask a parent of the autistic children when they first noticed symptoms of their child's regression in neurological behavior and function the majority of the parents tell me that it occurred shortly after their child received a round of vaccinations. Does this mean that vaccines are the cause of autism? That is a great question. There are many factors that play a role in the cause of autism and other special needs. But, vaccines can be a very powerful trigger in sending neurological challenges over the edge. Why? The amount of Nero toxins that are injected into our children is incredibly large. Mercury and aluminum are neurotoxic and can have very negative effects on the child's brain and brain function. Published in the Journal of American Physicians and surgeons Mark and David Geier document a strong association between the amounts of mercury injected with vaccines and autism - ("Thimerisol in Childhood Vaccines, Neurodevelopment Disorders and Heart Disease in the US"). As for aluminum, another preservative and heavy metal neurotoxin found in vaccines and injected into our children. The allowable levels according to the FDA for an 8-10lb infant are exceeded by more than 100x. In an IV drip, 30mcgs over a 24 hour period is the limit they consider safe. In one hepatitis B vaccine there is 250 micrograms typically given 12 hours from birth. In two months they get 5-8 more shots, therefore in a matter of seconds they get 1,200 to 2,000 micrograms of aluminum. This is hundreds of times more exposure to aluminum than what's considered safe. Combine this onslaught of neuro toxic chemicals injected into our children's bodies from the multiple vaccines along with a potentially weakened immune system or a predisposition to being more susceptible to vaccine injury due to what toxins may have been passed down through the generations or any other trauma at birth... We have some big challenges we are faced with resulting in vaccine injury and a lot of hard work associated with the caring of that child. If you feel your child has been altered from any kind of vaccine we are here to help you take the next steps in providing a safe and effective approach to removing the toxins that negatively affected the brain of your child. We want to give you and your family the freedom, the piece of mind, and hope for a better future.
